Name: Strawberry Blonde Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE basil in mixing glass. Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Berry vodka dominates with hints of strawberry and basil.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2003 at Oxo Tower Bar, London, England
